      • validateTrack

        public static boolean validateTrack(float averageSpeed,
                    Enums.Transportation t)
        This method validates the the average speed of the current track to prevent cheating.
        Parameters:
        averageSpeed - the average speed of the current track
        t - the current way of transportation
        Returns:
        if valid true, else false
